Target-Stance Extraction

  • The Target Stance Extraction project aims to develop a system that identifies the target of a stance and classifies the stance as ’Favor,’ ’Against,’ or ’Neutral.’ This is done using advanced machine learning models to understand opinions and sentiments in text data
  • My role focused on models, extraction of information from scanned documentsand detecting errors in the code and correcting them

    View Doc Code

    ShopSmart

    ShopSmart is a Local Online Shopping System where shop owners can add items to their online stores, and users can select available items for home delivery via a third-party system. The project leverages ReactJS and JavaScript for building a dynamic and responsive user interface, for smooth shopping experience. The backend is powered by FastAPI and Python for efficient performance.

    Python FastAPI PostgreSQL HTML CSS JavaScript React JS
